intro1: I am a Master's student at <1>École Nationale d'Informatique (ENI), Fianarantsoa</1> and a passionate <2>full stack</2> web developer who loves creating high-performance, scalable, and modern applications. I enjoy building elegant frontend interfaces as much as designing robust backend APIs.
intro2: My favorite stack includes technologies like <1>React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, TypeScript, Express, MySQL</1>. I'm constantly learning, testing new tools, and improving my skills to deliver clean, maintainable, and efficient code.

portfolio.title: Next.js Portfolio
portfolio.description: My personal site built with Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion.

api.title: Node.js REST API
api.description: A secure API with JWT, Express, and MySQL.

dashboard.title: React Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Admin interface with charts and authentication for the FIMISA association.

Pvc.title: Pvc: Traveling Salesman Problem
Pvc.description: Optimization tool for solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using heuristics and algorithms for route planning and logistics.

Pva.title: Pva: Programmation par Points de Valeur Ajoutée
Pva.description: Application de gestion de projet basée sur les points de valeur ajoutée (PVA), permettant un suivi précis des performances et de l'avancement des tâches.
